name: Balls and Holes Roll the balls
name_original: Balls and Holes Roll the balls
description:
«Balls and holes» is an unique game on improving dexterity and patience. The goal of this game is to get the ball into the hole by tilting the phone in different directions. Red balls should be rolled into the hole last of all.
The main features:
- Completely free of charge game;
- Use of physics engine for the balls motion;
- 100+ levels to pass;
- New levels are constantly added.
